review: . I was so excited when I opened this Christmas gift, which seemed to access well the first two weeks.  It's been downhill since then with constant access issues.  When it works, it's great.  There seems to be no consistent reason why it suddenly freezes or loops.  Access is sometimes limited  or unavailable.  I have changed batteries, held down buttons, etc, listed on Help website and it's still temperamental.  Would I suggest it to someone else?  No.
author: Lea

review: From initial use, it seems pretty solid. I have experienced a few problems where the sound goes out, but the picture doesn't. That gets annoying really fast. The other complaint I have is that you have to go through 3 menus to put it into 'sleep mode'. Either the remote should have a shut down button OR they should put an option right on the main menu to do that.
author: Joseph Malinowski

review: Awesome!  It's very easy to connect and set up. We used it to replace the internet streaming from our dvd player.  It's faster on YouTube and also has Netflix app and prime video.  Weather apps and news apps and so much more! Some apps are free trial and then you have to pay. But overall there are many free ones and we haven't even seen them all. I think we could completely do away with dish now!  I have chrome stick in our game room but I like the fire best overall.
author: Sherry Hunter
